item.title: Moviepy
item.description: Magic with Moviepy How to make vErY sLiCk Harry Potter edits with Python code Cool Video-Editing setupThis setup is not mine. I just wanted a video editing setup picture. So, that’s that. Now let’s talk about what I did and how I did that. The end goal is to create a video somewhat like this. Step 1 Collect some video clips of the characters belonging to some particular Hogwarts House you want to make a video of.
